title: Donald Trump's approval rating slips to new lows in a pair of polls
shortDescription: The president is nearing 100 days of his second term, but voters are expressing discontent with his approach to a range of issues.

title: Trump promised Day 1 economic boom. Americans are still waiting.
shortDescription: Nearing Trump's 100th day in office, economy isn't getting better for most, with tariffs, stock market convulsions and high grocery bills.

title: Americans react to 100 days of Trump-onomics
shortDescription: President Donald Trump promised to end inflation and bring down food costs right away after he took office. Here's what Americans think 100 days in.

title: See photos: Trumps and Bidens attend pope's funeral
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump were among those attending the funeral of Pope Francis. Former President Biden attended, too.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy meet for first time since Oval Office clash
shortDescription: The White House said Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelenskyy 'met privately today and had a very productive discussion.'

title: How to watch the 2025 White House Correspondents' Dinner
shortDescription: The 2025 dinner will not have its traditional headlining comedian as the association removed Amber Ruffin in March following critical Trump comments.

title: Over half of Americans disapprove of Trump's second term: Survey
shortDescription: A recent survey by the New York Times and Siena College Research suggests most Americans consider President Trump's second term "chaotic."

title: Takeaways from Trump's Time 100 interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump sat down with Time magazine to talk everything from Kilmar Abrego Garcia's return to ending the Ukraine war.

title: Judge blocks Trump from ending union bargaining for many federal workers
shortDescription: A March executive order stripped hundreds of thousands of federal workers of the right to unionize.

title: Trump NASA pick was arrested, sued over millions in casino debts
shortDescription: Jared Isaacman was sued in 2009 by the Trump Taj Mahal casino over $1 million in bad checks. The casino later settled for $650,000.

title: From powerplays to pushback: How Trump's 100 days are hitting home
shortDescription: 100 days after returning to power, Donald Trump is charging ahead with tariffs, an immigration crackdown and federal cuts, including dismantling DEI.

title: Trump reverses termination of student visas
shortDescription: The Trump administration restored visa registrations for potentially thousands of foreign students.

title: Deep-sea mining gets boost from Trump via executive order
shortDescription: The order marks Trump's latest attempt to boost U.S. access to nickel, copper and other critical minerals.

title: Trump's support on immigration policies wane this term, poll shows
shortDescription: Donald Trump has charged forward with controversial immigration policies in his first 100 days. A new poll by ABC/WashPo/Ipsos shows waning support.

title: NATO chief mum on Trump's Ukraine comments, peace talks
shortDescription: NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte refused after speaking with President Donald Trump to weigh in on a U.S. plan to end Russia's war against Ukraine.

title: Federal judge blocks Trump from cutting school funding over DEI
shortDescription: A federal judge in New Hampshire has blocked the Trump administration from cutting federal funding from public schools that continue to run diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) programs.

title: Trump open to returning Abrego Garcia: 6 takeaways from TIME interview
shortDescription: Trump discussed Kilmar Abrego Garcia's case, tariffs, Greenland and sending American criminals to foreign prisons in '100 days' interview with Time magazine.
